title: (x) Newspaper sans serif - Poynter Gothic Text {F
content:
Does anybody know this font? It's being used   
on a local newspaper for titling and captions.   
   
It has many weights and a serif version   
for the text.   
   
 ![thing](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106085548im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/9259.jpg)   
   
PS: Garcia-Media designed the newspaper
author: hugocristo

comments.content:
Beleza HUGO!   
   
This like Poynter Gothic Text Black Condensed   
   
See HERE:   
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/specimen.tpl?cart=10513852894020567&fontname=PoynterGothicText](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106085548/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/specimen.tpl?cart=10513852894020567&fontname=PoynterGothicText)   
   
FbAg
